Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Don Carman (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Steve Carlton (PHI)...
Injured on 4/23/1985 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/27/1986 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/12/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $9,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $11,875,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1989, hitting .476 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/26/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Injured on 3/22/1990 with a Fractured Jaw, out for 3-4 weeks...
